messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

You want to organize a fundraiser with 16 socialites. Paul is connected to Bob, Nick, Sherry, and John. Bob is connected to  Paul, Nick, Sherry, and Rose. Nick is connected to  Paul, Bob, Sherry and Amanda. Sherry is also connected to Paul, Bob, Nick, and William. Amanda is connected to  Peter, John, Daisy, and Nick. Peter is connected to Amanda, John, Daisy, and Adam. John is connected to Paul, Daisy, Peter, and Amanda. Daisy is also connected to Amanda, Peter, John, and Maggie. Alisa is connected to Maggie, Jennifer, Adam, and Russell. Maggie is connected to Alisha, Jennifer, Daisy, and Adam. Jennifer is connected to Andrew, Alisha, Adam, and Maggie. Adam is also connected to Alisha, Maggie, Jennifer, and Peter. Andrew is connected to William, Russell, Rose, and Jennifer. William is connected to Sherry, Andrew, Russell, Rose. Russell is connected to Andrew, William, Rose, and Alsiha. Rose is also connected to Andrew, William, Russell, and Bob. Initially, you were told that Rose can donate $250K while Maggie can donate $500K. Also, if you want to get connected with Amanda, you need to pay $10K to her company. Assume now that Bob and Rose are not connected. Also, Peter and Adam are not connected anymore. You have been told that Paul and John are not connected. Also, Andrew and Jennifer are not connected anymore. From Paul, what is the path to the person who can donate the most money? Please list the names in order, separated by commas.

Step 1: Remove the incorrect connections mentioned in the text (Bob-Rose, Peter-Adam, Paul-John, and Andrew-Jennifer).

Step 2: List the current connections:

Paul -> Nick, Sherry
Bob -> Paul, Nick, Sherry
Nick -> Paul, Bob, Sherry, Amanda
Sherry -> Paul, Bob, Nick, William
Amanda -> Peter, John, Daisy, Nick
Peter -> Amanda, John, Daisy
John -> Daisy, Peter, Amanda
Daisy -> Amanda, Peter, John, Maggie
Alisha -> Maggie, Jennifer, Adam, Russell
Maggie -> Alisha, Jennifer, Daisy, Adam
Jennifer -> Alisha, Adam, Maggie
Adam -> Alisha, Maggie, Jennifer
Andrew -> William, Russell, Rose
William -> Sherry, Andrew, Russell, Rose
Russell -> Andrew, William, Rose, Alisha
Rose -> Andrew, William, Russell

Step 3: Identify the person who can donate the most money - Maggie ($500K)

Step 4: Find the path from Paul to Maggie

Paul -> Nick -> Amanda -> Daisy -> Maggie

Answer: Paul, Nick, Amanda, Daisy, Maggie

expected_answer: Answer: Paul, Sherry, William, Rose, Russell, Alisha, Maggie
transReval.parsed_response: Answer: Paul, Nick, Amanda, Daisy, Maggie
